short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access key Case Status features from the same window of your Case Management System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy, single pane of glass access to Case Status from your case management software window. Enhance your case management software experience with Case Status for Google Chrome and gain seamless access to the powerful features of Case Status including engagement activities, messaging (including translation into 138 languages and AI recommended responses) documents, checklists, cases list, appointments tab, internal chat and collaborators tab.  

Note: this extension is intended for use by law firm staff (not end-user clients).  Case Status account is required to use this extension.  

Over 1 million legal clients trust law firms that use Case Status.  Case Status is the leader in legal client engagement software boasting a 4.9 rated App from tens of thousands of legal clients.   Law firms use Case Status to streamline communications and grow their businesses.

When you are logged into Case Status and your Case Management System on a specific matter or case, our extension opens a convenient side panel displaying the relevant Case Status interface and enables instant access to your favorite client engagement tools. As you navigate through your case management software to a new case or matter, the extension is always at the ready to display information in the Case Status system.

Our extension seamlessly integrates with the leading case management software solutions. Check out https://www.casestatus.com/integrations to see how we can integrate with your case management software.

Upgrade your case management experience with our powerful Google Chrome extension today!

If you are looking to download the highly-rated Case Status App, click below:
- Apple: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/case-status/id1268078389?ls=1
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.briefcase.casestatus

HAVE QUESTIONS?
Learn more about Case Status at https://www.casestatus.com/

If you have any problems or suggestions please visit https://support.casestatus.com/hc/en-us for useful resources.
